description:
Gitleaks is a fast, light-weight, portable, and open-source secret scanner for git repositories, files, and directories.
With over 6.3 million docker downloads, 10.9k GitHub stars, and over 400k homebrew installs, gitleaks is the most trusted secret scanner among security professionals, enterprises, and developers.
summary: Gitleaks – Open-source secret scanner for git repositories, files, and directories
author: Zachary Rice,  Gitleaks LLC,  Gitleaks Committers
